name: Apollo Client merge object field 最小
description: オブジェクトフィールドのmerge関数で部分更新

files.template:
import { InMemoryCache } from '@apollo/client';
export const cache = new InMemoryCache({ typePolicies: { User: { fields: { profile: { merge(existing = {}, incoming){ return { ...existing, ...incoming }; } } } } } });
